publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7637.1 Mary Mulligan: Dario Franchitti—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7637) in the name of Ian McKee, insert at end "; reminds MSPs that motion S3M-7145, Parliament Congratulates Bathgate’s IndyCar Champ, was lodged on 5 October 2010 and was current until 21 December 2010, and considers that a larger number of members’ signatures to this motion would have given more consideration and coverage to Scotland’s world-class sportsmen and women".
